Description of incident: Cole Taylor Mortgage (a division of Cole Taylor Bank) informed customers of a data breach that occured due to an error by one of their third party vendors. Information was inadvertently made accessible to employees of another federally regulated bank. The information included names, addresses, Social Security numbers, loan numbers and certain loan information. According to the mortage company, the breach was caused by a technical error by the vendor that provides them information technology services and solutions to both banks.The company has established a dedicated toll-free hotline for those who were affected at 1-800-572-9809.
